about_the_game:
Inspired by the admired Dead Space Series, Discover the massive horrifying world of The Red Selene, Survive through the connected worlds of Colony EC-21 Janus, and travel to the Red Selene itself and back to uncover the story of yourself and the horrors that happened in the colony. Enjoy the technical and artistic achievements of indie classic gaming!



Jump into the new genre of the ultimate sci-fi horror survival and all-out action now with your beloved pixel-art classic games. Find, Search, and grab the top items weapons, and resources through your journey use them in the modern combat system with a traditional and retro vibe, and enjoy killing tons of different enemies in your own way! Immerse yourself in the huge hand-drawn environments with massive details, You'll never rest easy as the environmental audio design is always there to make you experience a new level of fear!




  • Massive Connected Open World
  • All-out horror Metroidvania
  • Classic survival
  • Large Upgrade and Skilltree
  • Meet +100 Different Enemies Humans and Monsters
  • Gorifing Boss Fights
  • Search and Loot the world
  • Exploration



A Story of LOVE, HORROR, AND FAMILY
In the year 2858, Join Aaron a galaxy bounty hunter, on his journey to EC-21 JANUS, a state-of-the-art space colony on a secret mission to research and harvest THE RED SELENE, a moon with robust material and an unknown element, and find the dark horrors and mysteries of this ship.




As in Aaron's last dog fight with bandits, his ship is heavily damaged while making his space travel through a space portal he'll end up in an uncoordinated system and finds out the EC-21 JANUS, he'll embark on the classified space colony to seek help repairing his ship to only find the deep silence in the colony and the dark mysteries behind it. Through the roller coaster of his journey, he'll find out he can't relate more to EC-21 JANUS.

Survive through the darkest horrors and fight the most brutal creatures in the galaxy to discover your story of TRUTH, LOVE, AND REVENGE!



Your survival depends on how you fight, whether in the quiet corners of the EC-21 JANUS or in the middle of the waves of the monster running to you, you'll have to cut the legs, use your axe, and find a new weapon when you are out of bullets to make the survival happen!




  • Modern Shooter Design
  • Moves, Stamina, and action affect your shooting
  • Upgrade your character for ultimate powers
  • Find powerful weapons to wipe the RED DEATHS




In every inch of EC-21 JANUS, there could be an item that could help you survive, Searching, looting, and managing your resources is the key to success in making survival happen.




Search every corner of the environment and you can find valuable items! Anything can help you survive and make you more powerful in facing your enemies. Cheese what to carry wisely and manage your resources to master your survival



Platforming through the dark ruins of EC-21 JANUS, Solving puzzles, and escaping the most fatal events




Explore and begin your horror adventure in the massive open world of the EC-21 JANUS colony, Solve puzzles and platforms to discover new evidence. myths to uncover the horror history of humanity



Stay altered as danger lies in every corner of the colony, you are alone yet are never alone! it is possible that every enemy you see makes theirs to you! Be ready and you are never safe!




Be vigilant, Be Ware, and never rest easy that there are enemies in every corner of this world that want to rip you apart and make you one of them!

DEVELOPER"s ROADMAP
We would like to thank you for joining us! We are now in the Pre-alpha stage of the game. we have tons of ideas and we are taking our time executing each of them perfectly! We'll be updating this section and keeping you guys posted!



WE ARE SMASHING IT! WE WORK HARD TO MAKE IT FUN!
